name: Aircrack-ng_1.1-3_ar71xx_sddv_mod
short_description:

*Removed:
-packetforge-ng
-aircrack-ng
-kstats,
-airdecloak-ng
-buddy-ng
-ivstools,
-airdecap
-makeivs-ng
-wesside-ng
-aireplay-ng
-airodump-ng
-airodump-ng-oui-update
-airdriver-ng
-tkiptun-ng
-airbase-ng
-airtun-ng
-easside-ng

*Modified control file
Package: aircrack-ng(SDDV MOD)
Version: 1.1-3

Tested and works on TP-LINK WR-740N v2.1 & v2.4 (may work on other routers) with OpenWrt Barrier Breaker r37092
